section.title: Release 19.09 (unreleased)
section.para: This is the current unstable branch and the information in this section is therefore not final.

section.title: State Version Changes
section.para: The state version in this release includes the changes below. These changes are only active if the home.stateVersion option is set to "19.09" or later.

listitem.para: The programs.firefox.package option now expects a wrapped Firefox package and defaults to pkgs.firefox.
